description: sentence interaction opens up the mainstream IM and social platforms, helps enterprises and organizations establish a marketing system with social relations as the core, efficiently reaches and deeply connects tens of millions of customers.
card-1-subtitle: impress customers in conversation. Sentence interaction helps you aggregate and manage customer conversation messages on multiple platforms to create a more efficient marketing cloud platform.
card-2-subtitle: You can increase efficiency by 10 times, serve 200000 customers per capita, and provide your customers with a private domain experience of thousands of people and thousands of faces.
card-3-subtitle: sentence interaction builds a private domain operation system for leading brands in education, consumer goods, beauty, mother and baby, offline stores and other industries, covering annual sales of 10-300 billion.
